text: Nuko Nyagasani we amwakirira ubusabe neza, amukuza mu burere bwiza kandi agena ko arerwa na Zakariya. Buri uko Zakariya yinjiraga aho (Mariyamu) yasengeraga, yamusanganaga amafunguro, maze akamubaza ati “Yewe Mariyamu! Ibi ubikura he?” Akavuga ati “Ibi bituruka kwa Allah.” Mu by’ukuri, Allah aha amafunguro uwo ashaka nta kugera
